thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Four Found Shot Dead in Brooklyn Apartment

author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: Four Found Shot Dead in Brooklyn Apartment
text:
Three men and a toddler were found shot to death in a Brooklyn apartment building on Wednesday morning, police said.
A 53-year-old woman returned to her Riverdale Osborn Towers apartment in the Brownsville neighborhood around 5 a.m. to discover her granddaughter, Laylay Briggs, 1 year old, shot dead in a bedroom, police said. In the same room was the body of the childâ€™s 27-year-old father, Terrance Briggs, police said.
Police...
